full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN BSRUNG GTZO BO RNAMS LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA SRID GSUM DGU LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(CES RGYAL BA'I BSTAN BSRUNG GTZO BO RNAMS LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA SRID GSUM DGRA LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA @015B NGAG 'DON GYI RIM PAR BSGRIGS PA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'OD STONG GIS RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR DU GO BDE BA CI NAS KYANG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR, RANG LA 'CHANG RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYI YON TAN MED NA'ANG, ,^ PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN POS MDZAD PA'I GSER ZHUNG MAS GZHIR BYAS, ,'DIR MI 'DON PA'I CHOS SKYONG 'GA' ZHIG RNAMS BZHAG NAS, KHA BSKONG PAR 'OS PA RNAMS @016A *, ,BSNAN TE, BLO BZANG MING 'CHANG BAS BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO NYID DO,, ,,MANGGA LAm BHA WANTU,, ,,)*, ,DE NAS BSANG RDZAS SNA TSOGS PA PHYE MAR DAD LDAN PA SPAR LA, ,KYEE SRID PA'I RI RAG KHONG SENG NAS, ,DGRA LHA SPUN DGU GNAS 'DIR GSHEGS, ,RTA MCHOG RAB TU 'GYID PA'I STENG, ,MNGA' MDUNG RAL GRI DANG BCAS BZHUGS, ,LHA YI RGYAL PO 'BOD PA'I PHYIR, ,ZANGS DUNG RKANG GLING DAR DKAR GA-YAB, ,LHA @016B RGYAL KI ZHES SPYAN 'DREN NA, ,'DIR BYON RTAG PAR BZHUGS SU GSOL, ,PHYE MAR BSANG RDZAS DRI LDAN PA, ,LEGS PAR SBAR BA'I DUNG SPRIN DANG, ,DAM RDZAS BDUD RTZI'I GTOR TSOGS KYIS, ,DGRA LHA SPUN DGU MNYES GYUR CIG , ,,KHYED LA MCHOD CING BSTOD BGYID NA, ,KHYOD RNAMS BDAG LA NYE BAR MDZOD, ,YO SRONGS 'GYEL SLONGS CHANG BA 'THUD, ,DGRA THUL GNYEN RNAMS LEGS PAR SKYONGS, ,DGRA SDE MA LUS DRUNGS ZHING, ,GDON DANG BGEGS KYI @017A *, ,DPUNG CHOMS LA, ,NAD DANG MTSON MUG 'KHRUG PA'I TSOGS, ,NYER ZHI BKRA SHIS RGYA MTSO STZOL, ,(ZHES DGRA LHA'I GSOL MCHOD DO, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI GSUNG 'BUM LAS BTUS TE BRIS PA'O,, ,,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
